tool_description: Converts local birth time to UTC and determines historical timezone offsets for accurate astronomical calculations.
error_messages: Invalid timezone: Provide a valid IANA timezone identifier or UTC.
Timezone mismatch: The specified timezone doesn't match the geographic coordinates provided.
Historical timezone error: Unable to determine accurate timezone offset for dates before 1900.
Invalid datetime format: Provide datetime in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide local_datetime, timezone identifier, and geographic coordinates. Returns UTC equivalent time with timezone offset information.

timezone_offset.description: Timezone offset from UTC in hours

dst_active.description: Whether daylight saving time was active
